mapper.select: select * from chat_member c inner join member_img i on c.member_seq=i.member_img_member_seq join team_member t on c.member_seq=t.member_seq where c.chat_room_seq= #{chatRoomSeq} and t.team_seq= #{teamSeq} order by case when t.grade='매니저' then 1 when t.grade='부매니저' then 2 when t.grade='팀원' then 3 end, c.member_seq asc
mapper.delete: delete from chat_member where chat_room_seq = #{chatRoomSeq} and member_seq = #{memberSeq}
mapper.select: select m.member_img_sysname from member_img m inner join chat_member c on m.member_img_member_seq=c.member_seq where c.member_seq = #{memberSeq} and c.chat_room_seq = #{chatRoomSeq}
select * from chat_member where team_seq = #{teamSeq} and member_seq = #{memberSeq}
mapper.delete: delete from chat_member where team_seq = #{teamSeq} and member_seq = #{memberSeq}

delete from (select cm.* from chat_member cm left outer join team t on t.team_seq = cm.team_seq left outer join member m on t.team_owner_seq = m.member_seq where m.member_seq=#{memberSeq} and t.team_count = 1);
